structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Power of stenographer for Commonwealth's attorney to administer oath.
law.text: The stenographer for the Commonwealth's attorney shall have the same power of administering an oath as a notary public.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 43, effective January 1, 2015. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 17, sec. 27, effective January 1, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 73. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 236, sec. 2. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 1. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 89, sec. 1. -- Created 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 51, sec. 1.
